3/ Although conversion therapy has been widely discredited, it’s still legal on minors in most of America. About 700,000 adults have been through it, according to a 2018 study.

LGBTQ and suicide prevention advocates are fighting to ban the practice for minors in all 50 states.

1121910401980076034.text:
2/ Suicide is an all-too-frequent effect of conversion therapy. Kids whose parents try to change their orientation attempt suicide at over twice the rate of other LGB kids.

The rate nearly triples for those who also deal with intervention from "therapists and religious leaders."
